scripts.script: @Grapes([ @Grab(group='commons-lang', module='commons-lang', version='2.6') ]) import org.apache.commons.lang.SystemUtils import org.slf4j.Logger import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(getClass().getName()) logger.debug("This session's goals are {}.", session.goals) assert session.goals.size() == 1 logger.debug("The settings are {}.", session.settings) assert session.settings != null logger.debug("The local repository is {}.", session.localRepository) assert session.localRepository != null logger.debug("The reactor projects are {}.", session.sortedProjects) assert session.sortedProjects.size() > 0 logger.debug("The plugin artifacts are {}.", pluginArtifacts) assert pluginArtifacts.size() > 0 logger.debug("The mojo execution is {}.", mojoExecution) assert mojoExecution != null logger.debug("The plugin descriptor is {}.", mojoExecution.mojoDescriptor) assert mojoExecution.mojoDescriptor != null logger.debug("The Ant builder is {}.", ant) assert ant != null logger.debug("The log is {}.", log) assert log != null logger.debug("someProp is {}.", someProp) assert someProp == "someValue" logger.debug("cliProp is {}.", cliProp) assert cliProp == "someOtherValue" File targetDir = new File(project.build.directory) if (!targetDir.exists()) targetDir.mkdir() new File(targetDir, 'javaVersion.txt').append("Using Java ${SystemUtils.JAVA_VERSION}")
